entry.title: OpenCTI Installation on Google Cloud Platform

link.title: OpenCTI Installation on Google Cloud Platform

entry.summary:
Prerequisites System Requirement: OS : Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (x86/64, amd64) Disk Size: 30 GB # recommended more size as per your requirement memory: 16 GB core: 4 vcpu (1 shared core) Networking: Allow port 80 # http traffic Allow port 8080 Allow port 443 # https traffic
Access SSH Instance sudo ssh -i /path/to/privatekey username@external-ip
Create user and password for Open...
